meanings.definition: A person who shows respect for someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The respecters in the room all stood up when the teacher entered.
meanings.sent2: The respecters at the ceremony applauded politely.
meanings.sent3: The respecters in the library whispered so as not to disturb others.
meanings.sent4: The respecters in the audience nodded in agreement with the speaker.
meanings.sent5: The respecters in the group always listened attentively to each other.

meanings.definition: A group of people who show respect for a particular person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The respecters gathered around the war memorial to pay their respects.
meanings.sent2: The respecters of tradition upheld the customs of their ancestors.
meanings.sent3: The respecters of the old oak tree held a special ceremony to honor it.
meanings.sent4: The respecters of the elderly in the community volunteered to help them.
meanings.sent5: The respecters of nature worked together to clean up the park.
